description: Comprehensive, well-researched detailed outlook report on silver (USD/oz) covering 3-, 5-, and 7-year horizons. Include: executive summary, macro drivers, supply/demand analysis, ETF & retail flows, industrial demand (PV, EVs, electronics), mining and recycling supply, central bank/sovereign inventory dynamics, scenario-based price paths (Bull/Base/Bear) with probability weights, quantitative sensitivity analysis to real U.S. rates and USD strength, risk factors, investment opportunities and strategies (physical, ETFs, miners, royalty/streaming, futures/options, industrial hedging), monitoring checklist with indicators and triggers, recommended position sizing frameworks, tax/liquidity considerations, and a bibliography of sources (World Silver Survey, Silver Institute, major banks, ETF flow data, TradingEconomics, Reuters, Kitco, etc.). Target audience: institutional and sophisticated retail investors. Include charts/tables placeholders and suggested data sources. Output format: markdown. Estimated size: large (6,000–12,000 words). Target output file: reports/silver_outlook_3-5-7_years.md
strategy_description: Use streaming file writer for very large content
